name: Ai Monster Defense Game
description:
the story:

 in a world full of  AI monsters the Ai is going crazy, someone hacked

them, and we must protect the world. 

you start with one monster Ai who was saved accidentally by you and now you have a way to save the world.

you have one map for now but every map has different Ai monsters, you can heal Ai monsters then they help you to defend but be careful you have a limited number of  potions,

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

gameplay: 

mouse click: node/Ai monster/your Ai monster to get details,

camera move: mouse position, A W S D,

camera stop move: Escape,

to put a monster: you need to click on the Ai monster and then click where you want to put him.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

hope you guys like it (;
